trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Net.Mime" /> namespace holds types that are used to represent Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange (MIME) headers.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Net.Mime" /> contém tipos que são usados para representar cabeçalhos MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange).

trans-unit.source: These types are used with the types in the <see cref="N:System.Net.Mail" /> namespace to specify Content-Type, Content-Disposition and Content-transfer-Encoding headers when using the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient" /> class to send email.
trans-unit.target: Esses tipos são usados com os tipos no namespace <see cref="N:System.Net.Mail" /> para especificar os cabeçalhos Content-Type, Content-Disposition e Content-transfer-Encoding ao usar a classe <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient" /> para enviar email.

trans-unit.source: MIME data is represented by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class.
trans-unit.target: Dados MIME são representados pela <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> classe.
